Security Risk Alert

Stop Leaving a Trail When You Share Secrets

Sending passwords over Slack leaves a permanent, searchable trail. Anyone with access to your workspace history can find them. Burner destroys the secret after one read—no trace, no risk.

AES-256 Client-Side Encryption

1 Read
Then destroyed forever
